pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python Package BoilerplateThis is an minimal example of how to publish a python package.You can follow along with the [guide](https://nrempel.com/how-to-publish-a-python-package-to-pypi).### WARNING: do not run apply_custom_naming.py from another directory. It will delete things (potentially).### INFO: If no script name is entered, it will delete both the scripts directory and scripts line from setup.pyTo apply a custom name to your package, run:python3 apply_custom_naming.py
